member.name: UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_STATUS
member.summary: Defines the status for a storyboard.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_STATUS.UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_BUILDING
member.summary: The storyboard has never been scheduled.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_STATUS.UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_SCHEDULED
member.summary: The storyboard is scheduled to play.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_STATUS.UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_READY
member.summary: The storyboard is built and ready for scheduling.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_STATUS.UI_ANIMATION_STORYBOARD_INSUFFICIENT_PRIORITY
member.summary: Scheduling the storyboard failed because a scheduling conflict occurred and the currently scheduled storyboard has higher priority.
